quotes.quote: The combination of cheaper and more widespread broadband and increased mobile usage is turning us all into independent viewers.
What we obtain too cheap, we esteem too lightly; it is dearness only that gives everything its value.
I pity the man who wants a coat so cheap that the man or woman who produces the cloth will starve in the process.
Cheap is the love that has a price.
The pain is not about having cheap people around real pain is the fact that there are some people with a price to start with.
It is always cheaper to do the job right the first time.
Words are cheap. The biggest thing you can say is 'elephant'.
Cheaper does not always equal better.
The cheaper the crook, the gaudier the patter.
Being crazy of someone might seem cheap, but what if your life is priceless without that person.
People who are frugal understand the value of a dollar and make informed and thoughtful decisions. People who are cheap try to spend as little money as possible.
There's no such thing as a cheap laugh.
That who sold the expensive for no price, bought the cheap with the highest price.
If the price is very cheap then it's almost certainly a fake.
Never sell yourself cheap even when others are selling themselves cheaper than you are willing to sell yourself.
After a while you realize that putting your actions where your mouth is makes you less likely to have to put your money where your mouth is.
It costs a lot of money to look this cheap.
Freedom has cost too much blood and agony to be relinquished at the cheap price of rhetoric.
Real happiness is cheap enough, yet how dearly we pay for its counterfeit.
